General.Name: Simula Technology
General.Description: Simula Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells connectors, cables, and accessories in Taiwan, China, Europe, the United States, Asia, and Europe. It offers audio and DC jacks; solutions for wearable devices, such as pogo pin and pad, magnetic pogo connections, and wireless charging magnets and coil modules; USB products; plugs, receptacles, and cable assemblies; fleet asset management interconnect solutions; and customized solutions. Its product applications include consumer electronics, fleet telematics, medical and healthcare, and industrial and outdoor applications. Simula Technology Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1351, Zhongzheng Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
